# Karl Korsch

![korsch](data:image/png;base64,)

## 1886-1961

[Biography](https://www.marxists.org/glossary/people/k/o.htm#korsch-karl)

Photo: [Korsch in 1936](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/korsch-1936.jpg)

[Memories of Karl Korsch](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/memories-korsch.htm), Hedda Korsch 1972

[Materialism Versus Objectivism](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1946/non-dogmatic.htm#1894), 1894  
 [Theses on the Materialistic Conception of History](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1946/non-dogmatic.htm#1902), 1902  
 [Evolution of the Problem of the Political Workers Councils in Germany](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1921/councils.htm), 1921  
 [Introduction to Critique of Gotha Programme](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1922/gotha.htm), 1922  
 [Marxism and Philosophy](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1923/marxism-philosophy.htm), 1923  
 [The Marxist Dialectic](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1923/marxist-dialectic.htm), 1923  
 [The Marxism of the First International](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1924/first-international.htm), 1924  
 [Lenin and the Comintern](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1924/lenin-comintern.htm), 1924  
 [On Materialist Dialectic](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1924/materialist-dialectic.htm),1924  
 [Revolutionary Commune](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1929/commune.htm), 1929  
 [Marxism and Philosophy: An Anti-critique](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/19xx/anti-critique.htm), 1930  
 [The Spanish Revolution](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1931/spanish-revolution.htm), 1931  
 [The Crisis of Marxism](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1931/crisis-marxism.htm), 1931  
 [Theses on Hegel and Revolution](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1946/non-dogmatic.htm#1931), 1931  
 [On an Activistic Form of Materialism and on the Class and Partisan Character of Science](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1946/non-dogmatic.htm#1931a), 1931  
 [Introduction to Capital](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/19xx/introduction-capital.htm), 1932  
 [Theses toward a Critique of the Fascist Conception of the State](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1932/theses-fascist-state.htm), 1932  
 [Some Fundamental Presuppositions for a Materialist Discussion of Crisis Theory](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1933/crisis-theory.htm), 1933  
 [Why I am a Marxist](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1934/why-marxist.htm), 1934  
 [On the New Program of the American Workers Party](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1935/01/awp-program.htm), 1935  
 [Position on Russia and the Communist Party](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1935/position.htm), 1935  
 [Leading Principles of Marxism: A Restatement](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1937/restatement.htm), 1937  
 [The Passing of Marxian Orthodoxy](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1937/marxian-orthodoxy.htm), 1937  
 [The Marxist Ideology in Russia](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1938/marxist-ideology-russia.htm), 1938  
 [Lenin as Philosopher](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1938/lenin-philosophy.htm), 1938  
 [Karl Marx](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1938/karl-marx/index.htm), 1938  
 [Economics and Politics in Revolutionary Spain](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1938/economics-politics-spain.htm), 1938  
 [Marxism and the Present Task of the Proletarian Class Struggle](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1938/class-struggle.htm),1938  
 [Collectivization in Spain](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1939/collectivization.htm), 1939  
 [State and Counterrevolution](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1939/state-counterrevolution.htm), 1939  
 [The Fascist Counterrevolution](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1940/fascist-counterrrevolution.htm), 1940  
 [The Workers' Fight against Fascism](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1941/fascism.htm), 1941  
 [Britain And The War Aims Of The Working Class](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1941/britain.htm), 1941  
 [A Non-Dogmatic Approach to Marxism](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1946/non-dogmatic.htm), 1946  
 [Ten Theses on Marxism Today](https://www.marxists.org/archive/korsch/1950/ten-theses.htm), 1950

Further reading

[Letter to Karl Korsch](https://www.marxists.org/archive/bordiga/works/1926/letter-korsch.htm), Amadeo Bordiga 1926  
 [Review of “Karl Marx”](https://www.marxists.org/archive/mattick-paul/1939/korsch.htm) by Paul Mattick, 1939  
 [Karl Korsch: His Contribution to Marxism](https://www.marxists.org/archive/mattick-paul/1962/korsch.htm), Paul Mattick 1962  
 [The Marxism of Karl Korsch](https://www.marxists.org/archive/mattick-paul/1964/korsch.htm), Paul Mattick 1964
